Board
define the Board as Item[][] 0 = 0 side of the cell are free 1 = 1 side of the cell is free 2 = 2 sides of the cell is free 3 = 3 sides of the cell is free 4 = all sides of the cell are free 9 = the item is black 7 = the cell is null

ColumnRequest
 
ColumnResponse
 
CommonGoal0
common goal 0 : six groups each containing at least 2 tiles of the same type, the tiles pf one group can be different from those of another group
CommonGoal1
common goal 0 : six groups each containing at least 2 tiles of the same type, the tiles pf one group can be different from those of another group
CommonGoal10
common goal 10: five tiles of the same type forming an X
CommonGoal11
common goal 11: five columns of increasing on decreasing height starting from the first column on the left or the right each next column must be made of exactly one more tile tiles can be of any type
CommonGoal2
common goal 2: four groups each containing at least 4 tiles of the same type, the tiles of one group can be different from those of another group
CommonGoal3
common goal 2: four groups each containing at least 4 tiles of the same type, the tiles of one group can be different from those of another group
CommonGoal4
common goal 4: three columns each formed by 6 tiles maximum three different types.
CommonGoal5
common goal 5: eight tiles of the same type There's no restriction about the position of these tiles
CommonGoal6
common goal 6: five tiles of the same type forming a diagonal
CommonGoal7
common goal 7: four lines each formed by 5 tiles of maximum three different types one line can show the same or a different combination of other line
CommonGoal8
common goal 8: two columns each formed by 6 different types of tiles
CommonGoal9
common goal 9: two lines each formed by 5 different types of tiles one line can show the same or a different combination of other line
